title: Active@ Boot Disk Suite 6.5.0
description:
Active @ Boot Disk Suite - is a fully functional operating system that is easy to burn to CD / DVD / USB. It includes a set of tools to recover lost data, reset passwords, user accounts Windows, back up your system and securely erase data beyond recovery.

The boot drive, and can even be used for computers that do not load the primary operating system.

The main functions of Active @ Boot Disk Suite:

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Can be booted from CD, DVD or USB drive
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Ability to create a boot image from the Windows shell or DOS
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Wizard to create a boot disk
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Pre-selection of the image of the window Boot Disk Creator
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Add additional files to an image file
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Built-in tools to recover your files and data
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Built-in tools for backup using the recovery discs
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Create, delete and format partitions drives
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Reset your Windows administrator password
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Safely remove sensitive information from the disk without the possibility of recovery
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Utility monitoring the temperature and SMART attributes of a hard disk
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Built-in: the client terminal, Web browser, Telnet and FTP clients

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Download additional drivers on the fly or pre-installed directory
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Writing data to CD / DVD discs
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ File management: review of directories, search, copy and move files and folders
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Support FAT12, FAT16, FAT32, NTFS, NTFS5, NTFS + EFS file systems
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Supports advanced search of deleted files
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Supports all types of Flash memory cards
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Supports localized and long file names
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Supports compressed, encrypted and fragmented files on NTFS
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Supports IDE / ATA / SCSI drives
